baseListing.title: TalkKeys
baseListing.description:
TalkKeys transforms your voice into text instantly. Press a hotkey, speak naturally, and your words appear wherever you're typing - emails, documents, chat apps, or code editors.

Powered by Groq's lightning-fast Whisper AI, TalkKeys delivers accurate transcriptions in seconds, not minutes.

‚Ä¢ Smart text cleaning removes filler words and fixes punctuation

‚Ä¢ Floating widget shows recording status

Transform your transcribed text for any context:

‚Ä¢ Perfect for decoding corporate speak and technical docs
